resources.string:
This application has 
 been created only on the platform Android and by using Idea Platform "Android Studio 

 All rights reserved"
GOLD:\nMost of the game uses gold, this is the main payment unit, both for leveling the character and for shopping in the store.
CRYSTAL:\nCrystals is a donut currency, you can get it by buying for real money or for completing quests and entering the game. They have a high price, unlike gold, and are also used when buying.
